name: Day Before Pay Day Fried Rice
author: xvc
summary: This fried rice uses leftover vegetables and meat--a great way to use leftovers for a dish that can be ready in about 30 minutes.  It tastes so good that my son and husband fought over the last helping!
directions: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat
Pour in the eggs; cook and stir until scrambled and firm
Remove from wok, and set aside
Put remaining 2 tablespoons of oil in the wok and turn heat up to high
Stir in rice until each grain is coated with oil
Stir in chicken, celery, carrot, peas and green onions
Reduce heat to medium, cover and allow to steam for 5 minutes
Stir in scrambled eggs and soy sauce, and cook until eggs are heated through
